Uses of Class
Network

    • Uses of Network in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Network 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Network Network.activationFamily(int family)
      Specifies the activation family of the network.
      Network Network.autoAdjustLc()
      Specifies whether the network will automatically decrease the learning constant whenever the error deviates a lot.
      Network Network.batch(Matrix lX, Matrix lP)
      Sets up batch learning or mini-batch with the default batch size equaling the sample's length.
      Network Network.clone()
      Makes a clone of the network.
      Network Network.cores(int cores)
      Tells the network the number of cores we have (default is 2).
      Network Network.forcedImportSyns(Matrix[] M)
      Force-import an array of matrix into the network's synapses.
      Network Network.graphNumber(int numberOfGraph)
      Specifies the total number of graph sampling events the network will do.
      Network Network.graphSpace(int spaceBetweenGraphs)
      Specifies the distance between graph sampling events.
      Network Network.id(int id)
      Sets this network's id for exporting the training data.
      Network Network.importSyns(Matrix[] M)
      Import an array of matrix into the network's synapses.
      Network Network.importSyns(java.lang.String file)
      Import the network's synapses as either a .synapses or a .synx file.
      Network Network.learningStyle(int learnStyle)
      Specifies the learning style of the network.
      Network Network.learningTimes(int learnTimes)
      Specifies the intended learning times of the network.
      Network Network.miniBatch(Matrix lX, Matrix lP)
      Sets up mini-batches with the default batch size of 150.
      Network Network.miniBatch(Matrix lX, Matrix lP, int setPerBatch)
      Sets up mini-batchs.
      Network Network.setLc(double lc)
      Sets the initial learning constant for this network.
      Network Network.setLc(float lc)
      Sets the initial learning constant for this network.
      Network Network.sliceNumber(int numberOfSlice)
      Specifies the total number of slices the network will record.
      Network Network.stochastic(Matrix lX, Matrix lP)
      Sets up stochastic learning or mini-batch with the default batch size of 1.
      Network Network.testSet(Matrix X, Matrix P)
      Sets up the test set samples that the network will not train with but will use to record the performance.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Network 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix[] Network.cloneSynapses(Network net)
      Creates a clone of the array of synapses from a given network.
      static void Dir.export3d(processing.core.PApplet proc, _Float progress, Network net, Matrix lX, Matrix lP, processing.core.PVector synNum, processing.core.PVector p0, processing.core.PVector p1, java.lang.String path) 
      static void Dir.export3d(processing.core.PApplet proc, _Float progress, Network net, Matrix lX, Matrix lP, processing.core.PVector synNum, processing.core.PVector p0, processing.core.PVector p1, java.lang.String path, processing.core.PVector shift)
